definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Millions of streets, house numbers, points of interest at your fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 数以百万计的街道，门牌号码，在您的指尖兴趣点。

sentences.english: The sun shines on the shop sighs .
sentences.chinese: 灿烂的阳光照在商店门牌上。
“你的门牌号码是什么？”万斯太太问。

sentences.english: Joe nailed the doorplate to the wall.
The invention solves the problem that the doorplate can not be seen clearly in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 本发明解决了黑暗中看不清门牌号码的问题。

sentences.english: Many of the doorplates of houses and shops along the streets bear Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 街道两旁的许多门牌上都有中国字。

sentences.english: But the man came along, reading the numbers on the houses.
sentences.chinese: 那人一路骑过来，挨家看着门牌号码。

sentences.english: Woman I: I'm sure he just forgot your hut number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他只是忘了你的门牌号。

sentences.english: I can tell you the number of the house, though it isn't in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我可以告诉你房子的门牌号，尽管报纸上没写。

sentences.english: In this article, the authors describe mainly the results of the test for Qian Menpacking paper(VCI).
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍前门牌气相防锈纸的试验和使用结果。

sentences.english: First, write down your house number.
sentences.chinese: 首先，写下你的门牌号码。

sentences.english: Some house door numbers are like that as well.
sentences.chinese: 一些房子的门牌号码也是这样的。

sentences.english: I couldn't make out the house number in the murky light.
sentences.chinese: 在昏暗的光线下我看不清房子的门牌号。

sentences.english: The entrance is decorated with emblems and plates with wording against the red background.
sentences.chinese: 门口装饰着徽章和以红色为底标识语的门牌。

definition: Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
